title: Rear-end Paralysis in Dogs from the Rabies Vaccine | Naturally Savvy
cleaned_text: I am an animal naturopath. I am the Co-Founder of the former online school, the American Council of Animal Naturopathy (2011-2018), and the primary host and creator of the former podcast Animal Talk Naturally (2005-2018).I have a podcast (2018), the DOGgone Truth which offers new episodes every single week. I have dedicated myself to ongoing and extensive education and research into true natural animal care and health; as well as an exploration of hands-on experience in animal nutrition and naturopathic lifestyle with my own dogs as well as working with those seeking a healthier lifestyle and longer life for their pets. My love for animals is my passion and my life! Her blog is aspenbloompetcare.com

opengraph.title: Rear-end Paralysis in Dogs from the Rabies Vaccine | Naturally Savvy
opengraph.description: First I want to thank all of you for your well wishes about my current health situation. I am not gone yet humans, but alas things don't seem to be much better. The good news is I am eating a lot and still going for my daily walks. But I am losing weight (diabetes), and […]
